pullrequest.title: Add test for HarnessPlugin, reduce likelihood of race condition (#2034)

content.raw: Added some extra waits in c22e72b since the test was sometimes starting before the plugin had loaded the harness joint and failing. It's especially frequent when running the test without a display. It should be fixed now, and I've started a new batch of jenkins jobs
content.html: Added some extra waits in c22e72b since the test was sometimes starting before the plugin had loaded the harness joint and failing. It's especially frequent when running the test without a display. It should be fixed now, and I've started a new batch of jenkins jobs
